item.title: Friedrich Wilhelm Nietzsche (弗里德里希·威廉·尼采):
item.dc:creator: Mingyu Zhu
item.category: Famous Sayings & Paragraphs (名言 & 段落)
Friedrich Wilhelm Nietzsche (弗里德里希·威廉·尼采)
item.description: Reading history makes people wise, poetry witty, mathematics thoughtful, science profound, ethics solemn, logic and rhetoric makes people eloquent. 读史使人明智，读诗使人灵秀，数学使人周密，科学使人深刻，伦理学使人庄重，逻辑修辞之学使人善辩；凡有所学，皆成性格。
item.content:encoded:
Reading history makes people wise, poetry witty, mathematics thoughtful, science profound, ethics solemn, logic and rhetoric makes people eloquent.

读史使人明智，读诗使人灵秀，数学使人周密，科学使人深刻，伦理学使人庄重，逻辑修辞之学使人善辩；凡有所学，皆成性格。

item.title: Friedrich Wilhelm Nietzsche (弗里德里希·威廉·尼采 ):
item.dc:creator: Mingyu Zhu
item.category: Famous Sayings & Paragraphs (名言 & 段落)
Friedrich Wilhelm Nietzsche (弗里德里希·威廉·尼采)
item.description: Human life can not be measured by the length of time. When the heart is full of love, the moment is eternal! ——It really can’t be measured by the length of time. 人类的生命，不能以时间长短来衡量，心中充满爱时，刹那即永恒！——真的是不能以时间长短加以衡量。
item.content:encoded:
Human life can not be measured by the length of time. When the heart is full of love, the moment is eternal! ——It really can’t be measured by the length of time.

人类的生命，不能以时间长短来衡量，心中充满爱时，刹那即永恒！——真的是不能以时间长短加以衡量。

item.title: Aristotle (亚里士多德):
item.dc:creator: Mingyu Zhu
item.category: Famous Sayings & Paragraphs (名言 & 段落)
item.description: I have learned this through philosophy: I act out of self-consciousness, others act only because of fear of the law. 我通过哲学了解了这一点：我行事是出于自觉，他人行事只是因为害怕法律。
item.content:encoded:
I have learned this through philosophy: I act out of self-consciousness, others act only because of fear of the law.

我通过哲学了解了这一点：我行事是出于自觉，他人行事只是因为害怕法律。

item.title: Laozi (老子)：
item.dc:creator: Mingyu Zhu
item.category: Famous Sayings & Paragraphs (名言 & 段落)
item.description: Give a man a fish and you feed him for a day. 授人以鱼，不如授人以渔。
item.content:encoded:
Give a man a fish and you feed him for a day.

授人以鱼，不如授人以渔。

item.title: Friedrich Wilhelm Nietzsche (弗里德里希·威廉·尼采):
item.dc:creator: Mingyu Zhu
item.category: Famous Sayings & Paragraphs (名言 & 段落)
Friedrich Wilhelm Nietzsche (弗里德里希·威廉·尼采)
item.description: Most thinkers write poorly because they want to convey not only their own ideas, but also the process of thinking. 大多数思想家写得拙劣，因为他们不仅要传达自己的思想，而且要传达思考的过程。
item.content:encoded:
Most thinkers write poorly because they want to convey not only their own ideas, but also the process of thinking.

大多数思想家写得拙劣，因为他们不仅要传达自己的思想，而且要传达思考的过程。
